pr_title: Revert "Revert "fix(aws-datastore): selection set for nested custom types (#730)" (#777)"

timeline.message:
Revert "Revert "fix(aws-datastore): selection set for nested custom types (#730)" (#777)"

This reverts commit fbef1e8f9ccfb25e140bbb5199d018b016499958.

timeline.bodyText: @saltonmassally, @richardmcclellan, @jamesonwilliams I know this wasn't flagged on the original PR but just wanted to double check we're good changing this public method name since it would be a breaking change if anyone was currently using it?
timeline.author: TrekSoft

replies.bodyText: No one should be using our FieldFinder; it's an internal utility in the context of the project.
replies.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: @jamesonwilliams makes sense.  I just removed my commit entirely for now.
replies.author: richardmcclellan
